title: Ep142: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - Advance into Belgium
itunes:title: Ep142: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - Advance into Belgium
description:
It's August 1944 and the tanks of the 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry are leaving France behind them and pushing into Belgium. What new dangers await them?


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki


Become a member to listen ad-free and receive special bonus content for only £2 per month: https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history
